Create Proxy Object in Pythonhttps://ruddra.com/posts/python-proxy-object/Fri, 12 Apr 2019 01:06:22 +0600https://ruddra.com/posts/python-proxy-object/Lets say you have been using a class named ClassA, objects created from that class has been used in many places. Now you have a requirement that you need to make a simillar class ClassB, which has almost simillar functionality. Objects of ClassA and ClassB will have simillar method signatures, and could be swapable.
